address-suggestion.address-selection-legend: Please select an address option below:
address-suggestion.description: We found a suggested correction for the address you entered.

address-invalid.description: The mailing address you entered appears to be invalid. Please review the details below.

error-message.address-required: Enter mailing address, typically number and street
error-message.characters-valid: Only letters, numbers and the following characters are accepted: apostrophe ('), comma (,), period (.), hyphen (-) and bracket ()
error-message.city-required: Enter a city or town for your mailing address
error-message.country-required: Select a country for your mailing address
error-message.invalid-postal-zip-code-for-country: A Canadian postal code in the mailing address was entered but Canada was not selected as the country. Please select Canada, and the proper province, or change the postal code
error-message.invalid-postal-zip-code-for-province: The postal code does not match the province or territory you selected
error-message.postal-zip-code-required: Enter postal code or zip code for your mailing address
error-message.postal-zip-code-valid: Enter mailing address postal code in the correct format, such as A1A 1A1
error-message.province-state-required: Select a province, territory, state or region for your mailing address
error-message.zip-code-valid: Enter mailing address zip code in the correct format, such as 12345 or 12345-6789

index.optional-label: Complete all fields unless marked as optional.

review.address-sub-header: Thank you for validating your mailing address! Please review the information below to ensure it's correct.
